description: Virt Viewer provides a graphical viewer for the guest OS display. At this time is supports guest OS using the VNC or SPICE protocols. Further protocols may be supported in the future as user demand dicatates. The viewer can connect directly to both local and remotely hosted guest OS, optionally using SSL/TLS encryption.
summary: The virt-viewer application is a lightweight interface for interacting with the graphical display of virtualized guest OS.
author: Daniel P. Berrange (Original author), Christophe Fergeau, Marc-André Lureau, Hans de Goede, Michal Privoznik
